title: Average daily television viewing time in France 2005 to 2018
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Time in hours and minutes (hh.mm). In total the number of data points it has is 14.
In general Time in hours and minutes (hh.mm) has stayed the same over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2010 and 2011.
Maximum Time in hours and minutes (hh.mm), about 3.5 was reported at Year 2012
The lowest Time in hours and minutes (hh.mm), of value 3.24 was reported at Year 2006, and 2008
min_summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Time in hours and minutes (hh.mm), containing a total of 14 data points.
Overall Time in hours and minutes (hh.mm) has increased over the Year.
